titleStmt.title: The information of Edward Turbervill of Skerr in the county of Glamorgan, Gent Delivered at the bar of the House of Commons, Tuesday the ninth day of November, in the year of our Lord. 1680. Perused and signed to be printed, according to the order of the House of Commons, by me William Williams, speaker.
titleStmt.author: Turberville, Edward, 1648?-1681.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assigns of John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print bound before the title page.
Imperfect; pages have print show-through slightly affecting legibility.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
